name: Homemaker
description:
Homemaker is third person side scrolling 3D single player game with puzzle, horror,  thriller, exploration, and narrative elements. It’s the 1950’s and you play as a female trapped in a surreal house. You are on a quest of trying to find a way out. However, the house would rather see you dead than free.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Jump: Space
Sprint: Shift
